body:
motion
* feature
* classification
* model
* data



 


#fea 50x3 
## riding|run walk
###mix acc_max_walk 20 acc_max_walk 30  acc_max_15
after 10 times average accuracy
*  nn average accuracy not ensemble 65.2368421053
*  adaboost 0.796631578947
*  lr 0.673263157895
*  svm 0.627684210526
*  rf 0.846631578947######

unlike above ,trainset and testset completely independent , not overlap at all below

* nn average accuracy not ensemble 62.8545454545
* lr 0.723611111111
* svm 0.749826388889
* rf 0.89375
* adaboost 0.851215277778

10.26 adjust batch_sz,select stump>0.7

* accur nnrf ensemble 0.7890625
* accur nnrf ensemble 0.791666666667
* single best of all stumps 75.0
* acc rf 0.875
* acc gbdt 0.875

use dt as weak classifier, ensemble rf

* accur dt ensemble 0.8515625
* single best 0.723958333333
* acc rf 0.8828125
* acc gbdt 0.8828125

###single acc_max_20 acc_max_30   
after 10 times average accuracy

* nn 81.6342105263
* adaboost 0.905473684211#######
* lr 0.547526315789
* svm 0.698631578947
* rf 0.930763157895########
* 101 NN ->rf 0.82
* 101 lr ->rf 0.5
* 101 tree ->rf 0.82

unlike above,trainset testset not overlap below

* nn 88.92
* adaboost 0.920401337793
* lr 0.733444816054  lr 0.49
* svm 0.717725752508
* rf 0.944481605351

###single acc_max_15  
10times try, average accuracy

* adaboost 0.997868421053
